relation: Timeless Halo Ring Center stone size
textBeforeTable: Please note: This band is suitable only for our Timeless Halo ring for round centers. You must order the size band that corresponds to the center stone size of your halo micropave ring, or the band will not sit flush.    Online Shopping:      Ready to wear Halo Micropave Band each diamond is a .0075ct F-G, well-cut VS clarity natural white diamond (machine cut for precision) 18 total diamonds (9 on each side) Natural diamond details: Low profile for ease of daily wear Comfort fit interior Timeless Halo Band Details:   Further, because we made this ring entirely in-house, there is no middle man adding their own markup along the way, which allows us to price our Timeless Halo band at far less than you will find at any retail store while still offering extremely high-end quality. One or two bands can be worn with the Halo round engagement ring, allowing you to customize the appearance of your Timeless Micropave Wedding set.   The sides feature 18 total (9 each side) matched, top grade diamonds.  When matched with the Timeless Engagement ring, the result is stunning wedding set
